jobDescription: Data Modeler/Data Analyst  Location: Basking Ridge-NJ  Duration: 4 Months What client is looking for: You will need to have in depth knowledge on data processing, data modelling, application design, development, testing/implementation and data visualization/reporting. You make connections between data derived from different sources and synthesize it into one complete picture. You thrive in a fast-paced environment with multiple projects with competing priorities. Youll need to have:Bachelors degree or four or more years of work experience with focus on computer science, IMS, and relevant subjectsSix or more years of relevant work experience.Data management, architecture, analysis and visualization experience.Hands on development and technical project management working experienceExperience with Teradata, Aster, Hadoop and BI tools such as Tableau, Qlik.Proficient in programming using SQL, JavaScript, Hive, SparkExperience analyzing data, preparing reports, and presenting findings to multiple stakeholdersStrong communication skills and team spiritProficiency in all Microsoft Office applications.
